h2_title: Yoaguai King Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Star
content: After the spears have been thrown out from around her, she'll summon one last giant spear in her hand, and leap down towards you to pierce you with it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yoaguai King Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Star'.
The content is as follows:
After the spears have been thrown out from around her, she'll summon one last giant spear in her hand, and leap down towards you to pierce you with it.
